title: Keras vs MLflow: Which ml frameworks Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Keras vs MLflow. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Keras and MLflow? Both are popular ml frameworks tools, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Keras vs MLflow
paragraphs: Keras (ml frameworks) is High-level neural-network API offering fast experimentation on top of TensorFlow, JAX, and PyTorch.. It's known for API, Deep Learning, Prototyping.

MLflow (ml frameworks) is Open-source platform for the complete machine learning lifecycle, including experiment tracking, model packaging, and deployment management.. Users choose it for MLOps, Experiment Tracking, Model Management.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Keras: Intuitive layer API, Multi-backend support, Pretrained applications
MLflow: Experiment tracking, Model packaging, Model registry

verdict: Both Keras and MLflow are excellent AI tools. For ml frameworks, your choice depends on specific needs: Keras for API, MLflow for MLOps.
